ca.corefacility.gview.style.datastyle

Class SlotItemStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.style.datastyle.SlotItemStyle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureHolderStyle, PlotStyle

    public abstract class SlotItemStyle
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores style information specific to a set of items on the map (may or may not be features).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double heightAdjust
      Defines the adjusted height of the center of this item in the slot.
      protected java.awt.Paint[] paint 
      protected double thickness
      Describes the proportion of thickness of this set of items in a slot.
      protected float transparency

    • Field Detail

      • paint

        protected java.awt.Paint[] paint

      • transparency

        protected float transparency

      • heightAdjust

        protected double heightAdjust
        Defines the adjusted height of the center of this item in the slot. -1.0 = bottom, 0.0 = center, 1.0 = top.

      • thickness

        protected double thickness
        Describes the proportion of thickness of this set of items in a slot.

      • getHeightAdjust

        public double getHeightAdjust()
        Gets the heightAdjust in the slot. Must be between [-1,1], with -1 being bottom of slot, 0 being center, and 1 being top.
        Returns:
        The height adjust of items in there containing slot.
